name: Approach and Landing into Madrid - British Airways Boeing 767-300ER (*with ATC*)
description:
Approach and landing into Madrid-Barajas Airport runway 33R onboard British Airways Boeing 767-300ER G-BNWZ, operating flight BA456 from London-Heathrow on October 18 2014.

Includes ATC courtesy of LiveATC.net.

Full flight:  http://youtu.be/uhFAecZv-Cw

Video taken from seat 6A (Club Europe)

✈ ✈
Equipment used:

Camera: GoPro Hero4 Silver http://goo.gl/Wz7Uxt
Mount: Generic suction mount http://goo.gl/E2vRBs
Swivel Mount: http://goo.gl/vWQVne
Boya Frame Case for GoPro: http://goo.gl/tqM3H1
Battery: Anker E7 25600mAh  http://goo.gl/ZXfxOy
MicroSD cards: Sandisk 128GB http://goo.gl/KDjm4Y
